name: FLO_AUD_USER_COSIG
description: Stores the audit values for the requested cosigners or user that did cosign the data.

columns.name: FSD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the flowsheet data record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: AUDIT_USER_COSIG_ID
columns.description: This is the audit trail item for storing the user ID of the users that co-signed the data.

columns.name: AUDIT_USER_COSIG_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
